meanings.sent1: The mismarked price tag led to confusion at the store.

meanings.sent3: The mismarked map made the treasure hunt more challenging.
meanings.sent4: Her mismarked answer on the test caused her to lose points.
meanings.sent5: The mismarked trail caused us to get lost in the forest.
